keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance and transactions for April 2016.
The ending balance of the account as of April 30, 2016, was $155,810.95.
Significant transactions included multiple checks paid and preauthorized debits for payroll fees and utility payments.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees during this statement period.
